map(function, list) { 
    mapped-list = (); 
 
    for element in list { 
        push(mapped-list, function(element)); 
    } 
 
    return mapped-list; 
} 
 
double(num) { 
    return num * 2; 
} 
 
/* Cannot just print to stdout. We need at least one rule. */ 
#out { 
    doubled-numbers: map(double, (1 2 3 4 5)) 
}
